short_desc: Half-day enrichment program for children age 3 to kindergarten-ready
description: Offers half-day enrichment program for children age 3 years to kindergarten-ready. Focuses on social, physical, mental, emotional and spiritual development. Program includes indoor and outdoor activities, age-appropriate presentation of Biblical themes, prayer, and snack. Extended hours program available after the end of regular class times until 4pm.Lightning Bugs: 3 to early 4-year olds; choice of 2, 3 or 5 days per week, 9am-11:30am.Butterflies: Older 4-year olds and 5-year olds; choice of 2, 3 or 5 days per week, 9am-12pm.
